segments.text: I see a typical kitchen setup, quite a busy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy at the sink, focused on her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But these children are truly getting into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is on a rickety stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that stool, it's about to tip over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, aiding and abetting him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely disregarding any rules, I'm sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with all that water on the floor, it's a dangerous combination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to get hurt or make a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to watch such recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're probably going to break that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't children just follow simple instructions?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scenario is just asking for a chaotic outcome.
segments.speaker: PAR
